about_the_game:
Get equipped with MEGA tunes, featuring all the retro Mega Man 9 music composed by Ippo Yamada, Ryo Kawakami, Yu Shimoda, and Hiroki Isogai!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
